archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
United Daughters of the Confederacy Membership Applications
1894-1965
did.abstract: The collection consists of approximately 430 membership applications, ca. 1894-1965, for the Albemarle Chapter of the Virginia Division of both the United Daughters of the Confederacy and Children of the Confederacy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: United Daughters of the Confederacy, Virginia Division, Papers, Accession #11331, Special Collections Department, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This material was given to the Library by Nan Clarkson of Arlington, Virginia, on September 19, 1997.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of membership applications of the United Daughters of the Confederacy, Virginia Division, Albemarle Chapter, 1894-1965, together with some applications for the Children of the Confederacy, Mason Gordon Chapter, Albemarle County.

did.unittitle: Membership Applications: Children of the Confederacy ca. 1894-1965
